description: Acquires a use license from the Software License Server (SLS).
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLActivateProduct

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pProductSkuId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID*  A pointer to the product ID.

arguments.name: cbAppSpecificData
arguments.description: Type: UINT The size of application specific data.

arguments.name: pvAppSpecificData
arguments.description: Type: const PVOID A pointer to application specific data. The license server can use this      		information to embed application specific run-time information.

arguments.name: pActivationInfo
arguments.description: Type: const SL_ACTIVATION_INFO_HEADER* A pointer to additional product activation information.

arguments.name: pwszProxyServer
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The proxy server name. Set this to NULL to use automatic proxy discovery.

arguments.name: wProxyPort
arguments.description: Type: WORD The proxy server port. To use the default port, set wProxyPort to 0.

description: Gets a XrML genuine ticket acquired from the Software Licensing Server (SLS).
return_value: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If the method fails, it returns an error code. For a list of common error codes, see Common HRESULT Values.
name: SLAcquireGenuineTicket

arguments.name: ppTicketBlob
arguments.description: The address of a pointer to a buffer that receives the ticket BLOB. When you have finished using this buffer, free it by calling the LocalFree function.

arguments.name: pcbTicketBlob
arguments.description: A pointer to the size, in bytes, of the ppTicketBlob buffer.

arguments.name: pwszTemplateId
arguments.description: A pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the ID of the BLOB template stored on the SLS.

arguments.name: pwszServerUrl
arguments.description: A pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the URL of the SLS.

arguments.name: pwszClientToken
arguments.description: Reserved.

description: Closes the Software Licensing Client (SLC) context handle. When this function is called, 	the associated context on the Software Licensing Service (SLS) is released.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLClose

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

description: Let an application to exercise rights on a locally-stored licenses. Calling this function binds a license to the right.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLConsumeRight

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pAppId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the identifier of the application who's right is going to be           		consumed.

arguments.name: pProductSkuId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the identifier of product SKU. If set to NULL, all of the  product  SKU's           		licenses will be consumed.

arguments.name: pwszRightName
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The name of right to be consumed.

arguments.name: pvReserved
arguments.description: Type: PVOID Reserved.

description: Deposits licensing information previously collected and gathered using the SLGatherMigrationBlob function.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLDepositMigrationBlob

arguments.name: hFile
arguments.description: Type: HANDLE The file handle for the licensing state BLOB.

description: Gathers licensing information for the provided file handle. This licensing information   	can later be applied or deposited using the SLDepositMigrationBlob function.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGatherMigrationBlob

arguments.name: bMigratableOnly
arguments.description: Type: BOOL TRUE if only data that can be migrated should be gathered; FALSE otherwise.

arguments.name: pwszEncryptorUri
arguments.description: Type: LPCWSTR The URI of the encrypting session key used to encrypt       		any sensitive data in the output BLOB. Only valid values are NULL and SL_DEFAULT_MIGRATION_ENCRYPTOR_URI,      		which both refer to the same key.

arguments.name: hFile
arguments.description: Type: HANDLE The handle to the file where the licensing state BLOB should be written.

description: Deposits Installation ID (IID) and Confirmation ID (CID) for offline activation.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLDepositOfflineConfirmationId

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pProductSkuId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the product ID.

arguments.name: pwszInstallationId
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The Installation ID generated by the SLGenerateOfflineInstallationId function.

arguments.name: pwszConfirmationId
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The confirmation ID CSR.

description: Deposits Installation ID (IID) and Confirmation ID (CID) for offline activation.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLDepositOfflineConfirmationIdEx

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pProductSkuId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the product ID.

arguments.name: pActivationInfo
arguments.description: Type: const SL_ACTIVATION_INFO_HEADER* A pointer to additional information.

arguments.name: pwszInstallationId
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The Installation ID generated by the SLGenerateOfflineInstallationId function.

arguments.name: pwszConfirmationId
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The Confirmation ID CSR.

description: Sends a specified event to a registered listener.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLFireEvent

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pwszEventId
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The ID of the event to be fired.

arguments.name: pApplicationId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the application ID.

description: Generates the  Installation ID (IID).     	 Users can send the IID to CSR to get the Confirmation ID (CID).
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGenerateOfflineInstallationId

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pProductSkuId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the product ID.

arguments.name: ppwszInstallationId
arguments.description: Type: PWSTR* The Installation ID string. Once you are finished, call the LocalFree function to       		free the memory.

description: Generates Installation ID (IID). Users can send the IID to CSR to get the Confirmation ID (CID).
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGenerateOfflineInstallationIdEx

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pProductSkuId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer the product ID.

arguments.name: pActivationInfo
arguments.description: Type: const SL_ACTIVATION_INFO_HEADER* A pointer to additional information.

arguments.name: ppwszInstallationId
arguments.description: Type: PWSTR* The Installation ID string. Once you are finished, call the LocalFree function to       		free the memory.

description: Gets information about the specified application.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGetApplicationInformation

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pApplicationId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the application ID.

arguments.name: pwszValueName
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR  ValueMeaning  SL_INFO_KEY_IS_KMS L"IsKeyManagementService"   Indicates whether the machine has a Key Management Service (KMS) enabled.   SL_INFO_KEY_KMS_CURRENT_COUNT L"KeyManagementServiceCurrentCount"    The number of volume clients on a KMS host that are currently active.   SL_INFO_KEY_KMS_REQUIRED_CLIENT_COUNT L"KeyManagementServiceRequiredClientCount"   The minimum number of VL clients required to connect to a KMS host for enabling activation.   SL_INFO_KEY_KMS_UNLICENSED_REQUESTS L"KeyManagementServiceUnlicensedRequests"   The number of KMS requests from VL clients with License Status=Unlicensed.   SL_INFO_KEY_KMS_LICENSED_REQUESTS L"KeyManagementServiceLicensedRequests"   The number of KMS requests from VL clients with License Status=Licensed.   SL_INFO_KEY_KMS_OOB_GRACE_REQUESTS L"KeyManagementServiceOOBGraceRequests"   The number of KMS requests from VL clients with License Status=OOB Grace.   SL_INFO_KEY_KMS_OOT_GRACE_REQUESTS L"KeyManagementServiceOOTGraceRequests"   The number of KMS requests from VL clients with License Status=OOT Grace.   SL_INFO_KEY_KMS_NON_GENUINE_GRACE_REQUESTS L"KeyManagementServiceNonGenuineGraceRequests"   The number of KMS requests from VL clients with License Status=Non-Genuine Grace.   SL_INFO_KEY_KMS_NOTIFICATION_REQUESTS L"KeyManagementServiceNotificationRequests"   The number of KMS requests from VL clients with License Status=Notification.   SL_INFO_KEY_KMS_TOTAL_REQUESTS L"KeyManagementServiceTotalRequests"   Total number of valid KMS requests.   SL_INFO_KEY_KMS_FAILED_REQUESTS L"KeyManagementServiceFailedRequests"   Total number of failed KMS requests.

arguments.name: peDataType
arguments.description: Type: SLDATATYPE* A pointer to a value of the SLDATATYPE enumeration that specifies the type of data in the ppbValue buffer.  The following values are valid.  ValueMeaning  SL_DATA_SZ    UNICODE string   SL_DATA_DWORD    DWORD   SL_DATA_BINARY    Binary blob

arguments.name: pcbValue
arguments.description: Type: UINT* A pointer to the size, in bytes, of the ppbValue buffer.

arguments.name: ppbValue
arguments.description: Type: PBYTE* If successful, the data is returned in the buffer allocated by the SLC.        		When finished using the memory, free it by calling the LocalFree function.

description: Queries a policy from the set stored with the SLPersistApplicationPolicies function      	and loaded using the SLLoadApplicationPolicies function.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGetApplicationPolicy

arguments.name: hPolicyContext
arguments.description: Type: HSLP The context handle returned by the SLLoadApplicationPolicies function.

arguments.name: pwszValueName
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The name of the policy to query, or "*" for all policies.

arguments.name: peDataType
arguments.description: Type: SLDATATYPE* A pointer to the type of the data, if available.

arguments.name: pcbValue
arguments.description: Type: UINT* A pointer to  the size, in bytes, of the data, if  available.

arguments.name: ppbValue
arguments.description: Type: PBYTE*  The data, if available.

description: Stores the current consumed policies to disk for fast policy access.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
remarks: If the internal consumption fails then any current cache data is deleted.    	Subsequent calls to the SLLoadApplicationPolicies function will return      	SL_E_APPLICATION_POLICIES_MISSING. The SLPersistApplicationPolicies function returns success if the policy update succeeds,    	regardless of internal consumption results.
name: SLPersistApplicationPolicies

arguments.name: pApplicationId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the identifier of the application ID to be used for the fast policy queries.

arguments.name: pProductSkuId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the identifier of the ACID to be used for the fast policy queries.

arguments.name: dwFlags
arguments.description: Type: DWORD Additional flags.

description: Loads the application policies set with the SLPersistApplicationPolicies function    	for use by the SLGetApplicationPolicy function.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLLoadApplicationPolicies

arguments.name: pApplicationId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the identifier of the application ID to be used for the fast policy queries.

arguments.name: pProductSkuId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the identifier of the ACID to be used for the fast policy queries.

arguments.name: dwFlags
arguments.description: Type: DWORD Additional flags.

arguments.name: phPolicyContext
arguments.description: Type: HSLP* A pointer to a policy context for use in the SLGetApplicationPolicy function and     		the SLUnloadApplicationPolicies function.

description: Gets the authentication results.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGetAuthenticationResult

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pcbValue
arguments.description: Type: UINT* A pointer to the size, in bytes, of the authentication result.

arguments.name: ppbValue
arguments.description: Type: PBYTE* A pointer to the authentication result. When finished using the memory, free it by calling the LocalFree function.

description: Gets information about the genuine state of a Windows computer.
return_value: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If the method fails, it returns an error code. For a list of common error codes, see Common HRESULT Values. This function can return the following values defined in Slerror.h.
name: SLGetGenuineInformation

arguments.name: pAppId
arguments.description: A pointer to an SLID structure that specifies the application to check.

arguments.name: pwszValueName
arguments.description: A pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the name associated with the value to retrieve. The following names are valid.  ValueMeaning  SL_BRT_DATA   Get a value that specifies whether the computer is genuine.   SL_BRT_COMMIT   Get a value that specifies whether the computer is in nongenuine grace period mode.   SL_GENUINE_RESULT   Get the value returned from the last call to the SLAcquireGenuineTicket function.   SL_NONGENUINE_GRACE_FLAG   Gets the cause of the computer being put into nongenuine grace period mode.

arguments.name: peDataType
arguments.description: A pointer to a value of the SLDATATYPE enumeration that specifies the type of data in the ppbValue buffer.

arguments.name: pcbValue
arguments.description: A pointer to the size, in bytes, of the ppbValue buffer.

arguments.name: ppbValue
arguments.description: The address of a pointer to an array of BYTE pointers that specifies the value associated with the name specified by the pwszValueName parameter. When you have finished using this array, free it by calling the LocalFree function.

description: Specifies information about the genuine status of a Windows computer.
return_value: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If the method fails, it returns an error code. For a list of common error codes, see Common HRESULT Values. This function can return the following values defined in Winerror.h and Slerror.h.
name: SLSetGenuineInformation

arguments.name: pAppId
arguments.description: A pointer to an SLID structure that specifies the application for which to set information.

arguments.name: pwszValueName
arguments.description: A pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the name associated with the value to set. The following names are valid.  ValueMeaning  SL_BRT_DATA   Set information about the genuine state of the computer.   SL_BRT_COMMIT   If the SL_BRT_DATA value  is set, setting SL_BRT_COMMIT puts the computer in nongenuine grace period mode.

arguments.name: eDataType
arguments.description: A pointer to a value of the SLDATATYPE enumeration that specifies the type of data in the pbValue buffer.

arguments.name: cbValue
arguments.description: A pointer to the size, in bytes, of the pbValue buffer.

arguments.name: pbValue
arguments.description: A pointer to an array of BYTE values that specify the value associated with the name specified by the pwszValueName parameter. Some name-value pairs allow this parameter to be NULL. In this case, the existing value of the name-value pair is deleted. When you have finished using this array, free it by calling the LocalFree function.

description: Specifies information about the genuine status of a Windows computer.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGetGenuineInformationEx

arguments.name: pAppId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the application ID.

arguments.name: pwszValueName
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The name associated with the value of the property to set.

arguments.name: peDataType
arguments.description: Type: SLDATATYPE* A pointer to a value of the SLDATATYPE enumeration that specifies the data type in the ppbValue buffer.

arguments.name: pcbValue
arguments.description: Type: UINT* A pointer to the size, in bytes, of the ppbValue buffer.

arguments.name: ppbValue
arguments.description: Type: BYTE** A pointer to the genuine status retrieved.  When finished using the memory, free it by calling the LocalFree function.

description: This function returns a list of product key IDs associated      	with the specified Product SKU ID.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGetInstalledProductKeyIds

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC session.

arguments.name: pProductSkuId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the product SKU ID.

arguments.name: pnProductKeyIds
arguments.description: Type: UINT* A pointer to the number of product Key IDs returned.

arguments.name: ppProductKeyIds
arguments.description: Type: SLID** A pointer to an array of the product Key IDs.

description: [SLInstallSAMLicense is available for use in the operating systems specified in the Requirements section. It may be altered or unavailable in subsequent versions.  ]
return_value: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If the method fails, it returns an error code. For a list of common error codes, see Common HRESULT Values.
name: SLGetInstalledSAMLicenseApplications

arguments.name: pnReturnedAppIds
arguments.description: A pointer to the number of elements in the ppReturnedAppIds array.

arguments.name: ppReturnedAppIds
arguments.description: The address of a pointer to an array of pointers to SLID structures that identify applications.

description: [SLInstallSAMLicense is available for use in the operating systems specified in the Requirements section. It may be altered or unavailable in subsequent versions.  ]
return_value: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If the method fails, it returns an error code. For a list of common error codes, see Common HRESULT Values. This function can return the following values defined in Slerror.h.
name: SLInstallSAMLicense

arguments.name: pApplicationId
arguments.description: A pointer to an SLID structure that specifies the application for which to install a SAM license.

arguments.name: cbXmlLicenseData
arguments.description: The size, in bytes, of the pbXmlLicenseData buffer.

arguments.name: pbXmlLicenseData
arguments.description: A pointer to an array of BYTE pointers that specifies data for the SAM license.

description: Returns the license file BLOB.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGetLicense

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pLicenseFileId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the license file ID.

arguments.name: pcbLicenseFile
arguments.description: Type: UINT* A pointer to the size, in bytes, of the license file BLOB.

arguments.name: ppbLicenseFile
arguments.description: Type: PBYTE* The license file BLOB.

description: Checks if the license BLOB has been  	installed already.
return_value: If the License has been previously installed, it returns a SLID.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGetLicenseFileId

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: cbLicenseBlob
arguments.description: The size, in bytes, of the license BLOB.

arguments.name: pbLicenseBlob
arguments.description: A pointer to the number of licenses in the BLOB.

arguments.name: pLicenseFileId
arguments.description: A pointer to the license file ID.

description: Gets the specified license information.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGetLicenseInformation

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pSLLicenseId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the license ID.

arguments.name: pwszValueName
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The name associated with the value to retrieve.. The following values are valid.  ValueMeaning  SL_INFO_KEY_DESCRIPTION L"Description"   The description of the license.   SL_INFO_KEY_LICENSE_TYPE L"LicenseType"   The type of the license.   SL_INFO_KEY_VERSION L"Version"   The version of the license.

arguments.name: peDataType
arguments.description: Type: SLDATATYPE* A pointer to a value of the SLDATATYPE enumeration that specifies the type of data in the ppbValue buffer. Acceptable values are:  ValueMeaning  SL_DATA_SZ    UNICODE string   SL_DATA_DWORD    DWORD   SL_DATA_BINARY    Binary BLOB

arguments.name: pcbValue
arguments.description: Type: UINT* A pointer to the size, in bytes, of the ppbValue buffer.

arguments.name: ppbValue
arguments.description: Type: PBYTE* If successful, the data is returned in the buffer allocated by SLC.      		When finished using the memory, free it by calling the LocalFree function.

description: Gets the  licensing status of the specified application or SKU.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGetLicensingStatusInformation

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC Handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pAppID
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to a SLID that represents the application ID. 		  pAppIDpProductSkuIdResults  NULL  NULL  Get previous right consumption result.   NULL  Not NULL  Get licensing status of this SKU.   Not NULL  NULL  Get licensing status of this application.   Not NULL  Not NULL  Get licensing status of this application/SKU.

arguments.name: pProductSkuId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to a SLID that represents the product ID. 		  pAppIDpProductSkuIdResults  NULL  NULL  Get previous right consumption result.   NULL  Not NULL  Get licensing status of this SKU.   Not NULL  NULL  Get licensing status of this application.   Not NULL  Not NULL  Get licensing status of this application/SKU.

arguments.name: pwszRightName
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR Must be NULL.

arguments.name: pnStatusCount
arguments.description: Type: UINT* A pointer to the number of the SKU's status.

arguments.name: ppLicensingStatus
arguments.description: Type: SL_LICENSING_STATUS** A pointer to the licensing status of the SKU.

description: Gets the registered product key ID associated with the product.
return_value: If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGetPKeyId

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pwszPKeyAlgorithm
arguments.description: The product key algorithm.

arguments.name: pwszPKeyString
arguments.description: The product key string.

arguments.name: cbPKeySpecificData
arguments.description: The size, in bytes, of the product key specific data. If there is no PKey specific data, set cbPKeySpecificData to 0.

arguments.name: pbPKeySpecificData
arguments.description: A pointer to the product key specific data. If there is no PKey specific data, set pbPKeySpecificData to NULL.

arguments.name: pPKeyId
arguments.description: A pointer to the product key ID.

description: Gets the information of the specified product key.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGetPKeyInformation

arguments.name: hSLC

arguments.name: pPKeyId

arguments.name: pwszValueName
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The name associated with the value to retrieve.  The following names are valid.  ValueMeaning  SL_INFO_KEY_DIGITAL_PID L"DigitalPID"    Formatted PID structure for a PID4   SL_INFO_KEY_DIGITAL_PID2 L"DigitalPID2"   Formatted PID structure for a PID2   SL_INFO_KEY_PARTIAL_PRODUCT_KEY L"PartialProductKey"   First 5 characters of product key   SL_INFO_KEY_PRODUCT_SKU_ID L"ProductSkuId"   SKU SLID   SL_INFO_KEY_CHANNEL L"Channel"    Channel ID

arguments.name: peDataType
arguments.description: Type: SLDATATYPE* The data type.  ValueMeaning  SL_DATA_SZ    UNICODE string   SL_DATA_DWORD    DWORD   SL_DATA_BINARY    Binary BLOB

arguments.name: pcbValue
arguments.description: Type: UINT* A pointer to the size, in bytes, of the ppbValue buffer.

arguments.name: ppbValue
arguments.description: Type: PBYTE* A pointer to the data returned by SLC.           		When finished using the memory, free it by calling the LocalFree function.

description: Gets referral information for the specified product.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGetReferralInformation

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle retrieved by previous call to the SLOpen function.

arguments.name: eReferralType
arguments.description: Type: SLREFERRALTYPE The referral type.

arguments.name: pSkuOrAppId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the SLID of the application or SKU from which to obtain information.

arguments.name: pwszValueName
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The name associated with the value to retrieve.  The following names are valid.  ValueMeaning  SL_PARTNERID    Partner ID for the license reseller   SL_REFERRALID    Referral ID for the license reseller   SL_MERCHANTCOMMERCEURL    The merchant URL to purchase additional licenses   SL_MERCHANTUPGRADEURL    The merchant URL to purchase additional licenses   SL_DOWNLOADURL    A forward link to download the associated application   SL_INSTALLATIONPARAMETERS    Any parameters that are used when running the associated application's installer   SL_MERCHANTSUPPORTPHONENUMBER    The merchant support phone number(s)   SL_MERCHANTSUPPORTEMAIL    The merchant support email address   SL_MERCHANTSUPPORTURL    The merchant support URL   SL_SERIALIZEDDATA    A generic data BLOB

arguments.name: ppwszValue
arguments.description: Type: PWSTR* The value to store. When finished using the memory, free it by calling the LocalFree function.

description: [SLGetSAMLicense is available for use in the operating systems specified in the Requirements section. It may be altered or unavailable in subsequent versions.  ]
return_value: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If the method fails, it returns an error code. For a list of common error codes, see Common HRESULT Values. This function can return the following values defined in Slerror.h.
name: SLGetSAMLicense

arguments.name: pApplicationId
arguments.description: A pointer to an SLID structure that specifies an application.

arguments.name: pcbXmlLicenseData
arguments.description: A pointer to the size, in bytes, of the ppbXmlLicenseData array.

arguments.name: ppbXmlLicenseData
arguments.description: A pointer to an array of BYTE pointers that specifies license file information about the application identified by the pApplicationId parameter. When you have finished using this array, free it by calling the LocalFree function.

description: Checks the server status according to the specified      	URL and RequestType.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
remarks: Callers can either pass in the URL kept by themselves or get the SKU     	specific URL by calling the GetProductSkuInformation function and query each      	URL.
name: SLGetServerStatus

arguments.name: pwszServerURL
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The URL of the server.

arguments.name: pwszAcquisitionType
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The acquisition type.  SL_INFO_KEY_SECURE_PROCESSOR_ACTIVATION_URL (L"SPCURL") SL_INFO_KEY_RIGHT_ACCOUNT_ACTIVATION_URL (L"RACURL") SL_INFO_KEY_PRODUCT_KEY_ACTIVATION_URL (L"PKCURL") SL_INFO_KEY_USE_LICENSE_ACTIVATION_URL (L"EULURL") SL_INFO_KEY_PRODUCT_ACTIVATION_URL (L"PAURL")

arguments.name: pwszProxyServer
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The proxy server name. Set to NULL for automatic proxy discovery.

arguments.name: wProxyPort
arguments.description: Type: WORD The proxy server port. Set to 0 to use the default port.

arguments.name: phrStatus
arguments.description: Type: HRESULT* A pointer to the server status.

description: Gets global data information.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLGetServiceInformation

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pwszValueName
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The name associated with the value to retrieve.  The following names are valid.  ValueMeaning  SL_INFO_KEY_VERSION L"Version"   Version of SL service. e.g. "1.2.3.4"   SL_INFO_KEY_SYSTEM_STATE L"SystemState"   System State   SL_INFO_KEY_ACTIVE_PLUGINS L"ActivePlugins"    Fully-qualified DLL paths for all active plugins          				(NULL delimited and double NULL-terminated)   SL_INFO_KEY_SECURE_STORE_ID L"SecureStoreId"   Secure store ID (GUID)   SL_INFO_KEY_SESSION_MACHINE_ID L"SessionMachineId"   Session machine ID (Binary BLOB)

arguments.name: peDataType
arguments.description: Type: SLDATATYPE* A pointer to a value of the SLDATATYPE enumeration that specifies the type of data in the ppbValue buffer.  ValueMeaning  SL_DATA_SZ    UNICODE string   SL_DATA_DWORD    DWORD   SL_DATA_BINARY    Binary blob   SL_DATA_MULTI_SZ    Double null-terminated UNICODE string array

arguments.name: pcbValue
arguments.description: Type: UINT* A pointer to the size, in bytes, of the ppbValue buffer.

arguments.name: ppbValue
arguments.description: Type: PBYTE* If successful, the data is returned in the buffer allocated by SLC.     		When finished using the memory, free it by calling the LocalFree function.

description: Gets a list of SLIDs according to the input query ID type and the ID value.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
remarks: The following queries combinations are supported.
name: SLGetSLIDList

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: eQueryIdType
arguments.description: Type: SLIDTYPE The type of input ID.

arguments.name: pQueryId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the input ID.

arguments.name: eReturnIdType
arguments.description: Type: SLIDTYPE The type of returned IDs.

arguments.name: pnReturnIds
arguments.description: Type: UINT* A pointer to the number of returned IDs.

arguments.name: ppReturnIds
arguments.description: Type: SLID** An array of returned IDs.

description: Retrieves the value portion of a name-value pair from the licensing policy of a software component.
return_value: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If the method fails, it returns an error code. For a list of common error codes, see Common HRESULT Values. This function can return the following values defined in Slerror.h.
name: SLGetWindowsInformation

arguments.name: pwszValueName
arguments.description: A pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the name associated with the value to retrieve.

arguments.name: peDataType
arguments.description: A pointer to a value of the SLDATATYPE enumeration that specifies the type of data in the ppbValue buffer.

arguments.name: pcbValue
arguments.description: A pointer to the size, in bytes, of the ppbValue buffer.

arguments.name: ppbValue
arguments.description: A pointer to an array of BYTE pointers that specifies the value associated with the name specified by the pwszValueName parameter. When you have finished using this array, free it by calling the LocalFree function.

description: Retrieves the DWORD value portion of a name-value pair from the licensing policy of a software component.
return_value: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If the method fails, it returns an error code. For a list of common error codes, see Common HRESULT Values. This function can return the following values defined in Slerror.h.
name: SLGetWindowsInformationDWORD

arguments.name: pwszValueName
arguments.description: A pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the name associated with the value to retrieve.

arguments.name: pdwValue
arguments.description: A pointer to the value associated with the name specified by the pwszValueName parameter.

description: Stores the specified license and returns a license file ID.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLInstallLicense

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: cbLicenseBlob
arguments.description: Type: UINT Size of license BLOB.

arguments.name: pbLicenseBlob
arguments.description: Type: const BYTE* A pointer to the licenses in the BLOB.

arguments.name: pLicenseFileId
arguments.description: Type: SLID* A pointer to the license file ID.

description: Registers the product key with SL.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLInstallProofOfPurchase

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pwszPKeyAlgorithm
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The product key algorithm.

arguments.name: pwszPKeyString
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The product key string.

arguments.name: cbPKeySpecificData
arguments.description: Type: UINT The size, in bytes, of product key specific data. If there is no PKey specific data, set cbPKeySpecificData to 0.

arguments.name: pbPKeySpecificData
arguments.description: Type: PBYTE A pointer to the product key specific data. If there is no PKey specific data, set pbPKeySpecificData to NULL.

arguments.name: pPKeyId
arguments.description: Type: SLID* A pointer to an identifier of the registered product key. This SLID can be used to reference PKey information later.

description: Register the product key with SL.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLInstallProofOfPurchaseEx

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pApplicationId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the application ID.

arguments.name: pProductSkuId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the product SKU ID.

arguments.name: pwszPKeyAlgorithm
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The product key algorithm.

arguments.name: pwszPKeyString
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The product key string.

arguments.name: cbPKeySpecificData
arguments.description: Type: UINT The size, in bytes, of the product key specific data. If no PKey specific data exists, set cbPKeySpecificData to 0.

arguments.name: pbPKeySpecificData
arguments.description: Type: PBYTE A pointer to product key specific data. If no PKey specific data exists, set pbPKeySpecificData to NULL.

arguments.name: pPKeyId
arguments.description: Type: SLID* A pointer to the  identifier of the registered product key. Used to reference PKey information.

description: Checks whether the specified application is a genuine Windows installation.
return_value: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If the method fails, it returns an error code. For a list of common error codes, see Common HRESULT Values.
remarks: This function checks the Tampered flag of the license associated with the specified application. If the license is not valid, or if the Tampered flag of the license is set, the installation is not considered valid.
name: SLIsGenuineLocal

arguments.name: pAppId
arguments.description: A pointer to an SLID structure that specifies the application to check.

arguments.name: pGenuineState
arguments.description: A pointer to a value of the SL_GENUINE_STATE enumeration that specifies the state of the installation.

arguments.name: pUIOptions
arguments.description: A pointer to an SL_NONGENUINE_UI_OPTIONS structure that specifies a dialog box to display if the installation is not genuine. If the value of this parameter is NULL, no dialog box is displayed.

description: Checks whether the specified application installation is genuine.
return_value: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If the method fails, it returns an error code. For a list of common error codes, see Common HRESULT Values.
remarks: This function checks the Tampered flag of the license associated with the specified application and the SKU, if specified. If the license is not valid, or if the Tampered flag of either license is set, the installation is not considered genuine.
name: SLIsGenuineLocalEx

arguments.name: pAppId
arguments.description: A pointer to an SLID structure that specifies the application to check.

arguments.name: pSkuId
arguments.description: A pointer to an SLID structure that specifies the SKU of the application to check. If this parameter is not NULL, this function uses the value of this parameter instead of the value of the pAppId parameter to check whether the application installation is genuine. If the SKU license contains a ProductUniquenessGroupId  value, that value is also used to check whether the application is genuine.

arguments.name: pGenuineState
arguments.description: A pointer to a value of the SL_GENUINE_STATE enumeration that specifies the state of the installation.  This function does not change the value of this parameter if the return value is any value other than S_OK. If this parameter is NULL, the function fails with a return value of E_INVALIDARG.

description: Initializes the Software Licensing Client (SLC) 	and connects SLC to the Software Licensing Service (SLS).  	If the function succeeds, a context handle is returned for subsequent calls.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLOpen

arguments.name: phSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC* A pointer to a context handle returned from the Software Licensing Service.

description: Associates information with the specified product for both online and phone activation.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLPersistRTSPayloadOverride

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC Handle retrieved by previous call to the SLOpen function.

arguments.name: pApplicationId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the identifier of the application ID to be used for the fast policy queries.

arguments.name: pProductSkuId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the identifier of the ACID to be used for the fast policy queries.

arguments.name: pbData
arguments.description: Type: BYTE* A pointer to the byte data that will be sent during activation. This function assumes the data is composed of a 20-bit value stored in the first three bytes:       		Byte[0] is the LSB of the HIWORD, Byte[1] is the HSB of the LOWORD, and Byte[2] is the LSB of the LOWORD.    		Any value composed of these three bytes that exceeds 20 bits will be rejected with E_INVALIDARG.

arguments.name: cbData
arguments.description: Type: DWORD The number of bytes that will be stored.  This must be set to 3.

description: [This API is not available to all Windows/Windows Phone apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, calls to these APIs will fail at runtime.]
min_server: Windows Server 2016 [desktop apps | Windows Store apps]
return_value: If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an        HRESULT error code.
remarks: Your app must have the restricted slapiQueryLicenseValue capability to call the SLQueryLicenseValueFromApp function.
name: SLQueryLicenseValueFromApp

arguments.name: valueName
arguments.description: The name of the policy for which you want to get information.

arguments.name: valueType
arguments.description: The data type of the policy value. The following table describes the values that this parameter can         receive.  ValueDescription REG_DWORDA 32-bit integer.  For this type, the size of the buffer that the dataBuffer           parameter specifies should be at least 4 bytes. REG_BINARYA binary value. REG_SZA wide-character, null-terminated string, including the last null character.

arguments.name: dataBuffer
arguments.description: A buffer that receives the value of the component policy.

arguments.name: dataSize
arguments.description: The size of the supplied buffer, in bytes.

arguments.name: resultDataSize
arguments.description: The actual size of the data received for the policy value, in bytes.

description: This function is rearm application activation.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLReArm

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: pApplicationId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the application ID.

arguments.name: pProductSkuId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the product SKU ID.

arguments.name: dwFlags
arguments.description: Type: DWORD Flags for ReArm behavior.  Valid values are 0 or           		SL_REARM_REBOOT_REQUIRED.  Passing SL_REARM_REBOOT_REQUIRED will        		require a reboot before a function using the security processor can      		succeed.

description: Registers an event in the SL service. The caller can receive notifications when the registered event is fired.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLRegisterEvent

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC session.

arguments.name: pwszEventId
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The predefined SL event identifier.

arguments.name: pApplicationId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the  application ID to which the event will be registered.

arguments.name: hEvent
arguments.description: Type: HANDLE  The event handle used for notification.

description: Sets authentication data.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC context.

arguments.name: cbValue
arguments.description: Type: UINT The size, in bytes, of the authentication data in pbValue.

arguments.name: pbValue
arguments.description: Type: const BYTE A pointer to the authentication data.

arguments.name: pProductSkuId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the product SKU ID.

arguments.name: pProductKeyId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the product key ID.

description: [SLUninstallSAMLicense is available for use in the operating systems specified in the Requirements section. It may be altered or unavailable in subsequent versions.  ]
return_value: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If the method fails, it returns an error code. For a list of common error codes, see Common HRESULT Values. This function can return the following values defined in Slerror.h.
name: SLUninstallSAMLicense

arguments.name: pApplicationId

arguments.description: Type: HSLP The context handle returned by the SLLoadApplicationPolicies function.

arguments.name: dwFlags

description: Unregisters a registered event in the SL service.
return_value: Type: HRESULT WINAPI If this function succeeds, it return S_OK.  Otherwise,  it returns an HRESULT error code.
name: SLUnregisterEvent

arguments.name: hSLC
arguments.description: Type: HSLC The handle to the current SLC session.

arguments.name: pwszEventId
arguments.description: Type: PCWSTR The predefined SL event identifier that will be unregistered.

arguments.name: pApplicationId
arguments.description: Type: const SLID* A pointer to the application ID that the event will be unregistered from.

arguments.name: hEvent
